pf2e-graphics.animationsVolume-tooltip: Controls the volume of sounds created by PF2e Graphics.

cardsGone.name: Hide Cards Tab
cardsGone.hint: Hides the cards tab, effectively making the animations tab replace it.

volume.name: Animation Volume
volume.hint: Multiplies the volume of animations by a set amount. Does not override animations own volume settings.

history.name: Show Animation History to Players
history.hint: Animation History contains sensitive information, primarily about roll options. Enable this if you dont worry about players reading what kind of traits or abilities an NPC might have.

delay.name: Animation Delay
delay.hint: Adds a delay in seconds to every animation being processed and triggered.

persistent.name: Persistent Animations
persistent.hint: Enables persistent (looping) animations. Please note this can *SIGNIFICANTLY* reduce performance the more effects you have on screen. When turned off, premade animations will animate only once and possibly on start or end of turn.

quality.name: Performance Settings
quality.hint: What level of detail animations should have. Some animations may be more hardware-demanding, requiring you to lower this setting.

buttonPosition.name: Actor Button Position
buttonPosition.hint: Where the button for managing Actor Graphics should be located. Change it if you have too many modules adding header buttons.

dev.name: Developer Mode
dev.hint: Enables console logs. Helpful when you are trying to make your own animations. Also adds new settings, visible on refresh.

jb2aMode.name: [DEV] JB2A Mode
jb2aMode.hint: Switch between free or patreon version for the purposes of predicates.

suppressWarnings.name: [DEV] Suppress Startup Warnings
suppressWarnings.hint: Enable this setting if you are using an alternative source for animations than JB2A.
suppressWarnings.warnFremium: You have JB2A (Free) but have not enabled it, please enable it for PF2e Graphics to function as expected.
suppressWarnings.warnPremium: You have JB2A (Patreon) but have not enabled it, please enable it for PF2e Graphics to function as expected.
suppressWarnings.warnNone: You don't have JB2A installed, please install and enable it in order for PF2e Graphics to function!

error.missingPayload: Payload missing—your data may be corrupted.
error.tooMuchRecursion: Animation for {rollOption} recurses too many times! Do its references form an infinite loop?
error.cantFindReference: Couldn't find referenced payload for {rollOption}—run validation scripts to verify.

error.noActor: Failed to execute animation on {name} (couldn't find actor).
error.unownedToken: Failed to execute animation payload on {name} (you don't own this token).

error.noName: Failed to execute a crosshair payload (no name provided).
error.noActor: Failed to execute a crosshair payload (couldn't find actor for source token {token}).
error.unresolvedPosition: Failed to execute a crosshair payload (couldn't resolve position).

notifications.pickALocation: Click on the canvas to choose a position!
notifications.interrupted: Payload interrupted due to cancelled crosshair. Use the Effect Manager to remove any remaining graphics/sounds.

error.cantFindPlaceableForRelativeScaling: Failed to execute graphic payload (couldn't find placeable for scaling).
error.cantIdentifyPlaceableForRelativeScaling: Failed to execute graphic payload (couldn't identify placeable for scaling).

effectiveSize.name: Effective Size
effectiveSize.tooltip: If your token is an unusual size (e.g. a Medium token that is 1.2 grid-squares wide), set how many grid-squares its ring covers. See the PF2e Graphics wiki for more information.
